sw.text: Asiyefunzwa na mamae hufunzwa na ulimwengu.
sw.gloss: One not taught by their mother is taught by the world.

ha.text: Komai nisan jifa ƙasa zai fāɗo.
ha.gloss: No matter how far you throw, it falls to earth.

primers.title: Ngũgĩ wa Thiong’o — Decolonising the Mind
Amílcar Cabral — Tell No Lies, Claim No Easy Victories
